Name: HMS Avon Vale
Builder: John Brown Shipbuilding & Engineering Company Ltd. (Clydebank, Scotland)
awards:
Atlantic 1942–43
Malta Convoys 1941–42
Libya 1941–42
Sirte 1942
North Africa 1942–43
Adriatic 1944
English Channel 1943–44
Armament:
6 × QF 4 in Mark XVI on twin mounts Mk. XIX
AAA - 2 × 4 12.7mm Vickers, 2 × 20 mm
6 Thornycroft depth charge throwers
